isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9600 AND 9700 SLEEPER AND NON-SLEEPER CABS - CAB DOOR COMPONENTS DISASSEMBLY AND REASSEMBLY - DOOR GLASS REGULATOR MANUAL OR ELECTRIC

svcproc.title: DOOR GLASS REGULATOR MANUAL OR ELECTRIC

svcprocinfo.para: The cab door glass regulator is serviced as a complete unit manual or electric (Left or Right Side, Figure 36 and Figure 37). It is not necessary to remove the door glass, simply lower glass sufficiently to detach regulator arm from glass and then push glass back up into window frame. Secure glass temporarily to top of door with tape.

step1.para: Remove knob from door lock rod.
Remove screws retaining door trim panel upper and lower; with standard trim, remove arm rest.

step2.para: On passenger side door, remove screws retaining lower door window trim.

step1.para: Remove lower trim panel from door and disconnect wire from courtesy light and/ or regulator motor.
Remove screws retaining regulator arm to glass regulator arm guide.
Remove screw retaining upper panel to door.
Remove panel from door and disconnect remote control rod from inside door handle. Remove panel assembly.
Remove nuts retaining inside door handle and screws retaining ash tray to trim panel.
Lift upholstered trim off metal trim panel and remove screws retaining window glass regulator to trim panel ( Figure 38).

svcsubproc.title: Install
svcsubproc.para: Lubricate regulator gear teeth, arm pin and window guide at installation.

step1.para: Place regulator in position and start all retaining screws. Tighten all screws.
Install inner door handle and ash tray to trim panel.
Connect remote control relay rod to latch.
Remove tape holding glass. Lower glass into position.
Connect window and guide to regulator arm and secure ( Figure 33).

svcsubproc.para: If electrically operated window, connect wire connection.
Operate window to check window operation.
